description: Variation of condition 10 ( to allow the sale of food and convenience goods in unit 10) of planning application ref: P/2009/3602 dated 18/01/2010 (as amended by planning ref: P/2013/2703 dated 20/05/2014) for remodelling and extension to Westway Cross Retail Park; incorporating the Remodelling of the front elevations of the building, including replacement of the existing glazed canopies, partial demolition of Unit 8 and extension to unit 1 (No Net Increase), relocation of Class A3/A5 unit with enlargement by 47m2. construction of two ancillary class A1/A3 units totaling 270m2 and Construction of a new management unit  (adjacent to Green Park Way), upgrading of public realm, revised car parking circulation and car parking arrangements, additional service access from Rockware Avenue, Associated landscaping and improved provision for cycle parking, pedestrian access and disabled car parking.
